alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty; Lewis and Clark National Forest Rocky Mountain District-Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 23 at 4:44AM MDT until July 25 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 112 AND 114... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Glacier/Toole/Central/Eastern Pondera/Liberty and Lewis and Clark National Forest Rocky Mountain District-Rocky Mountain Front. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph Monday afternoon...shifting to west 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph Tuesday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts could be difficult to contain.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create high fire growth potential. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty; Lewis and Clark National Forest Rocky Mountain District-Rocky Mountain Front
